scripts.build: rm -rf build dist && bundle exec jekyll build && buildProduction --canonicalroot https://mntr.dk/ --outroot dist build/index.html build/wishlist/index.html build/font-demo/index.html --sharedbundles --asyncscripts --optimizeimages --sourcemaps --sourcescontent --subresourceintegrity --contentsecuritypolicy && cp src/_headers dist/ && node tools/netlify-headers.js >> dist/_headers
